title: PES CSE AI ML RR vs MSRIT CSE with some specs vs RVCE ETE

comments.body: Tbh at this period of time noone in this sub is interested to help and the one replying is just here to make a chance for second rounfd  seat..better do ur own research there are resources present on this subject ..just trust the mods

What answers are you looking for? Everyone on this sub has been helping as much as they can. You need to realise that people are busy - either with their exams or their internships, or actual full-time work. It does not help that people post the same x vs y college every 2 days without even bothering to search for an existing answer.

I would pick pes over msrit. And both are millions of lightyears above ete at rv. 

Why are your two comedk options msrit cs and rv ete? There's a lot inbetween right
imo, PES CSE AIML RR......the crowd in pes>>>msrit and then ete in rv just dont go unless u have a plan in pursuing ete

Well I did say do your own research with the s resources available at the sub ðŸ™‚ please read I know u are a graduate and I respect u for that but the guys commenting right k now are all giving false answers if u see their account they are just eyeing for yhe seat maybbe now u will say that I just want hear the answer that"pes is better â€œ
